name: Deadly Discs (KRFGames)
description:
Deadly Discs is a survival mini-game where you have to dodge saw blades that bounce of walls.  The longer you survive, the tougher the challenge shall get!

(I am currently planning to create larger 2D side-scroller projects in the near future. However, it has not been easy. I would have to get better at creating game art, learn how to design 2D levels, and learn how to create my own custom soundtrack and sound effects. I might also make a devlog on my progress creating the larger projects. To be completely honest, things have not been so easy in my personal life, and I have been taking game development tutorials on Udemy, which is why I had hardly created any ideas for games these days. I am hoping I could release a larger project at the end or this year or if not, next year.)
